Methods in gfx that return Sprite

Methods in gfx with parameters of type Sprite
 void Screen.render(int xp, int yp, int height, int width, Sprite sprite)
          Scales a sprite to the given size and renders it on the screen
 void Screen.render(int xp, int yp, Sprite sprite)
          Renders a sprite on the screen with the sprite's original size.
 void Screen.renderHue(int xp, int yp, Sprite sprite, int hueColor)
          Renders a sprite on the screen with an applied hue WARNING: Pretty slow
 void Screen.renderWidthInvisColor(int xp, int yp, Sprite sprite, int color)
          Renders a sprite per usual, but will treat any pixels with the given color as if it had 100% transparency
